languages.text: "{name}". {n}Хейнрикс коротко склоняет голову в знак приветствия.{/n} "Прошу прощения, что ворвался без предупреждения. Я получил известия, которые мне необходимо обсудить с глазу на глаз".
"{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Хейнрикс коротко склоняет голову в знак приветствия.{/n} "Прошу прощения, что ворвался без предупреждения. Я получил известия, которые мне необходимо обсудить с глазу на глаз".

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."
"{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."
"{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."
"{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}海因里希简短地向你点头致意。{/n}“很抱歉不请自来。我收到了情报，必须当面和你谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}海因里希简短地向你点头致意。{/n}“很抱歉不请自来。我收到了情报，必须当面和你谈谈。”

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Heinrix te saluda con un movimiento de cabeza seco.{/n} «Mis disculpas por presentarme aquí sin previo aviso. He recibido noticias que debo compartir con usted en persona».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Heinrix te saluda con un movimiento de cabeza seco.{/n} «Mis disculpas por presentarme aquí sin previo aviso. He recibido noticias que debo compartir con usted en persona».

languages.text: 「{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスは軽く頭を下げて挨拶した。{/n}「突然の乱入をお詫び申し上げます。陛下と対話するようにとの知らせを受けました」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスは軽く頭を下げて挨拶した。{/n}「突然の乱入をお詫び申し上げます。陛下と対話するようにとの知らせを受けました」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous salue d'un bref hochement de tête.{/n}« {name}. Je m'excuse d'arriver ainsi à l'improviste, mais j'ai reçu des nouvelles dont je dois vous parler en personne. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous salue d'un bref hochement de tête.{/n}« {name}. Je m'excuse d'arriver ainsi à l'improviste, mais j'ai reçu des nouvelles dont je dois vous parler en personne. »

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix nickt dir zur Begrüßung knapp zu.{/n} "Verzeiht, dass ich unangekündigt hereinplatze. Ich habe Neuigkeiten erhalten, die ich persönlich mit Euch besprechen muss."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix nickt dir zur Begrüßung knapp zu.{/n} "Verzeiht, dass ich unangekündigt hereinplatze. Ich habe Neuigkeiten erhalten, die ich persönlich mit Euch besprechen muss."

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix, başıyla kısaca selam veriyor.{/n} "Haber vermeden geldiğim için özür diliyorum. Seninle yüz yüze konuşmam gereken birtakım haberler aldım."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix gives you a curt nod in greeting.{/n} "I apologise for barging in unannounced. I have received news that I must discuss with you face to face."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix başıyla kısaca selam veriyor.{/n} "Haber vermeden geldiğim için özür diliyorum. Seninle yüz yüze konuşmam gereken bazı haberler aldım."
